title: Adamant plateskirt (g)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Adamant plateskirt (g) is a part of adamant gold-trimmed armour and a reward from medium Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as the regular Adamant plateskirt, and requires level 30 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

Item ID3475

Adamant plateskirt (g) is a part of adamant gold-trimmed armour and a reward from medium Treasure Trails. It has the same stats as the regular Adamant plateskirt, and requires level 30 Defence to wear. This item cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-21-11
 Defence bonuses
+33+31+29-4+31
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The plateskirt's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -7 to -11.

12 June 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Adam plateskirt (g)" to "Adamant plateskirt (g)".

'''Adamant plateskirt (g)''' is a part of [[adamant gold-trimmed armour]] and a reward from [[Clue scroll (medium)|medium]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It has the same stats as the regular [[Adamant plateskirt]], and requires level 30 [[Defence]] to wear. This item '''cannot''' be made via the [[Smithing]] skill.
